text: Frances Rose McIver (born 10 October 1988) is a New Zealand actress. She is best known for starring as Olivia "Liv" Moore in The CW television series iZombie (2015â€“2019). She has also starred in movies such as The Piano (1993), The Lovely Bones (2009), A Christmas Prince (2017), A Christmas Prince: The Royal Wedding (2018), A Christmas Prince: The Royal Baby (2019) and Daffodils (2019). McIver's television appearances include Xena: Warrior Princess, Hercules: The Legendary Journeys, Power Rangers RPM, Masters of Sex and Once Upon a Time. McIver was born in Auckland. She grew up in Titirangi. Her older brother is actor and musician Paul McIver. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Entertainers from North Island Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:New Zealand stage actors Category:New Zealand television actors Category:People from Auckland
title: Rose McIver
